TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 跟踪消息和任何关联数据。

span.span: Represents an ASP.NET trace message and any associated data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象封装跟踪消息、类别、任何关联的 ，以及是否由方法写入跟踪记录 。The object encapsulates the trace message, category, any associated , and whether the trace record was written by the method. 对和方法的每次调用 都会生成一个 添加到 消息集合的对象。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 您可以通过处理事件来访问记录的集合 。You can access the collection of records by handling the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册 委托来处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中， `OnTraceFinished` 方法 通过属性访问对象的集合 ，循环访问它们，并将它们写入响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对和方法的每次调用 都会生成一个 添加到 消息集合的对象。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法调用将属性设置 为 `true` ，而 方法调用将其设置为 `false` 。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the method calls set it to `false`.

summary.span: 获取跟踪记录的用户定义的类别。

span.span: Gets the user-defined category for the trace record.

value.span: 表示跟踪记录的类别的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a category for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别用于更好地将跟踪消息组织成可识别的组，但可以是任意字符串。The category is used to better organize trace messages into recognizable groups, but can be any string. 类使用 作为仅采用参数的方法的默认类别 `message` 。The class uses as its default category for methods that take only a `message` parameter. ASP.NET 的默认类别（在启用跟踪时写入多个跟踪记录）为 "aspx. page"。The default category for ASP.NET, which writes several trace records when tracing is enabled, is "aspx.page". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的 属性 ，以及如何将其和关联的跟踪消息输出到流中 `Response` 。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it and its associated trace message to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/CS/form5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/VB/form5vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A associated with the trace record, if one exists, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用跟踪来调试应用程序或排查错误和异常处理问题，则可以在跟踪记录中包含一个异常。You can include an exception in a trace record if you are using tracing to debug an application or troubleshoot error and exception handling. `null` 当跟踪记录与没有 显式 `errorInfo` 参数或未提供异常的方法之一相关联时，属性为。The property is `null` when the trace record is associated with one of the methods that does not have an explicit `errorInfo` parameter or no exception is provided.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查 的属性 ，以确定记录包含的消息是否由 或 方法调用编写。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property of a to determine whether the message that the record contains was written by a or method call. 如果跟踪记录是一条警告消息，则会执行不同于错误消息的操作。If the trace record is a warning message, a different action is taken than if it is an error message. summary.span: 获取用户定义的跟踪消息。

span.span: Gets the user-defined trace message.

value.span: 表示跟踪记录的消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a message for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息可以是任何字符串，并且用于写入详细的跟踪信息。The message can be any string, and is used to write detailed tracing information. 它对应于传递到和方法的消息参数 。It corresponds to the message parameter that is passed to the and methods. 这些信息可以是运行时值、为您定向的消息，并指导您完成程序的执行或其他诊断数据。The information can be run-time values, messages to orient you and guide you through a program's execution, or other diagnostic data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的 属性 ，并将其打印到 `Response` 流中。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]
